statements: SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM permissions WHERE permission_level > 2 ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT role_id, COUNT(*) AS total_permissions FROM permissions GROUP BY role_id ORDER BY total_permissions DESC
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_level BETWEEN 1 AND 3
SELECT MAX(permission_level) AS highest_permission_level FROM permissions
SELECT user_id, permission_level, created_at FROM permissions WHERE role_id = '1abc' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, role_id FROM permissions WHERE permission_level > 3 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(permission_level) AS total_permission FROM permissions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_permission > 10;
SELECT user_id, permission_level, created_at FROM permissions WHERE role_id = '2def' AND permission_level < 5 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS user_count, AVG(permission_level) AS average_permission FROM permissions WHERE role_id = '3ghi';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT feature_name, access_level FROM permissions WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE password = 'password123';
SELECT * FROM permissions ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT username, password FROM users ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT permission_id, feature_name FROM permissions WHERE access_level = 'admin'
SELECT users.username, permissions.feature_name FROM users INNER JOIN permissions ON users.user_id = permissions.user_id
SELECT user_id, permission_id, access_level FROM permissions WHERE feature_name LIKE '%profile%'
SELECT user_id, can_view, can_edit, can_delete FROM user_permissions;
SELECT role_id, can_create, can_share, can_manage_users FROM role_permissions;
SELECT user_id, can_view FROM user_permissions WHERE can_edit = true;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE can_delete = false;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id ASC, role_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, can_view, can_edit, can_delete FROM user_permissions WHERE can_view = TRUE;
SELECT role_id, can_create, can_share, can_manage_users FROM role_permissions WHERE can_share = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_id, can_create FROM role_permissions WHERE can_create = TRUE ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 2 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_roles;
SELECT role_name FROM roles;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 1;

SELECT role_name, permission_name FROM roles INNER JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id INNER JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_roles JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE user_roles.user_id = 5;

SELECT roles.role_name, permissions.permission_name FROM roles JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT user_roles.user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_roles FROM user_roles GROUP BY user_roles.user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT count(DISTINCT roles.role_name) AS num_unique_roles FROM roles;

SELECT roles.role_name, COUNT(role_permissions.permission_id) AS num_permissions FROM roles LEFT JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id GROUP BY roles.role_name ORDER BY num_permissions DESC;
SELECT * FROM roles;
SELECT username, user_id FROM users;
SELECT action_id, action_name FROM user_actions ORDER BY action_id DESC;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, permission_id FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM roles;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT permission_id, permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_name LIKE 'READ%';

SELECT u.user_id, u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.role_id = r.role_id JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT ua.action_id, ua.action_name, u.username FROM user_actions ua JOIN users u ON ua.user_id = u.user_id WHERE ua.action_name = 'DELETE' ORDER BY ua.action_id DESC;
